string.name: wp_generic_servererror
string.context: Alert appears when a server error makes completing a required webservice call impossible.

resources.string: Une erreur est survenue sur le serveur. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_generic_ok
string.context: Button used widely and generally. Closes a dialog when no action is possible

string.name: wp_generic_cancel
string.context: Button closes a dialog without taking any action. Can be found by attempting to cancel an appointment without canceling security if the department has a phone number

string.name: wp_generic_dismiss
string.context: Button closes a dialog or workflow without taking any action.

string.name: wp_core_generic_continue
string.context: Button closes a dialog and continues with the activity

string.name: wp_loadingdialog_general
string.context: Appears in a variety of places on the app when information is being loaded

string.name: wp_generic_error
string.context: Error dialog title

string.name: wp_generic_missingapplicationbrowser
string.context: used when MyChart wants to open a link to the browser but can't find a browser installed on the user's device

resources.string: Nous avons essayé d\'ouvrir ce lien mais nous n\'avons trouvé aucune application en mesure de le faire.

string.name: wp_generic_show_more
string.context: String used to indicate there is more content or text to be displayed

string.name: wp_generic_go_to_settings
string.context: Button used to jump to settings to enable permissions or to change settings

string.name: wp_generic_save
string.context: Button used to save something

string.name: wp_generic_networkerror
string.context: Alert message when the app detects a lack of network connection while trying to complete a task

resources.string: Veuillez vous assurer de votre connexion réseau et réessayer.

string.name: wp_generic_networkerrortitle
string.context: Alert title appears when the app detects a lack of network connection while trying to complete a task

string.name: wp_generic_more_info
string.context: More information

string.name: wp_generic_more_info_ax_hint
string.context: The accessibility hint for an info button to tell AX users how to interact with the image

resources.string: Appuyer deux fois pour plus d\'informations.

string.name: wp_core_generic_no
string.context: Button used widely and generally. Cancel a dialog and stop a workflow

string.name: wp_core_generic_yes
string.context: Button used widely and generally. Accepts a workflow and closes the dialog

string.name: wp_core_generic_warning
string.context: Generic warning string to be used in popups and warning banners. Used in less severe warning cases where the warning is informative and cautionary rather than something more severe.

string.name: wp_generic_h2g_info_for
string.context: Alert title appears when we are showing the patient which organization the info is for.

string.name: wp_core_bar_menu_app_preferences
string.context: Dropdown menu item title for menu item that takes the user to the app preferences screen

string.name: wp_core_bar_menu_switch_organizations
string.context: Dropdown menu item title for menu item that logs the user out and takes them to organization selection screen

string.name: wp_core_bar_menu_log_out
string.context: Dropdown menu item title for menu item that logs the user out and takes them to the login screen

string.name: wp_webview_not_supported
string.context: Alert appears when the user tries to launch a web view activity that is not supported on mobile

resources.string: Veuillez vous rendre sur le site Web pour afficher cette activité.

string.name: wp_webview_print_job_name
string.context: The file/job name for pages printed inside a MyChart webview. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name. %2$@ is the activity name. Ex: 'MyChart - Medications'

string.name: wp_webview_print_error
string.context: Error message shown when printing fails

resources.string: Un problème est survenu lors de l\'impression. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_menu_print_option
string.context: Label for Print option in menu

string.name: wp_print_onboarding_title
string.context: Title text for the onboarding page that teaches the user where to find the print option.

string.name: wp_print_onboarding_description
string.context: Description text for the onboarding page that teaches the user where to find the print option. $1$s is the name of the 'Print' option in the menu

resources.string: L\'impression est désormais disponible pour certaines pages dans l\'application. Pour commencer, recherchez l\'option %1$@ dans le menu à trois points en haut de l\'écran.

string.name: wp_print_onboarding_confirm_text
string.context: Confirm button text for the onboarding page that teaches the user where to find the print option.

string.name: wp_header_menu_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility text read out to describe the options menu located in the application header when focused on

string.name: wp_header_menu_accessibility_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint read out to describe the options menu located in the application header. Read out at the end of the accessibility readout to describe what action occurs when pressing the element.

string.name: wp_header_menu_error_toast
string.context: Error toast shown in the unexpected situation where the user has selected the menu, but there are no actions available

string.name: wp_header_accessibility_mychart_epic_logo
string.context: Accessibility label for Epic MyChart logo that shows up in the home page header, which opens fun facts about Epic and spins when tapped

resources.string: MyChart par Epic, anecdotes intéressantes sur Epic, effet de rotation

string.name: wp_header_accessibility_mychart_epic_logo_close
string.context: Accessibility label for Epic MyChart logo that shows up in the home page header, which hides the fun facts about Epic and spins when tapped

resources.string: MyChart par Epic, ferme les anecdotes intéressantes sur Epic, effet de rotation

string.name: wp_header_accessibility_mychart_epic_logo_spin
string.context: Accessibility label for Epic MyChart logo that shows up in the home page header, which spins when tapped

resources.string: MyChart par Epic, effet de rotation

string.name: wp_today
string.context: Appears in a variety of places to indicate today

string.name: wp_tomorrow
string.context: Appears in a variety of places to indicate today

string.name: wp_community_organization_last_refresh_date
string.context: The previous/last date the user updated the organization's community link. %1$@ is the date of the last update.

string.name: wp_community_organization_out_of_date_missing
string.context: Text displayed when a DXR organization is missing its access/refresh date.

resources.string: Informations de mise à jour non disponibles

string.name: wp_community_organization_up_to_date
string.context: For organizations with live links (External MyChart/Fhir), we show the refresh date as 'Up-to-date'

string.name: wp_community_organization_dxr_warning
string.context: Text warning users that some of their data may not be loaded. Tells user to visit their DXR organization's patient portal for the complete information. %1$@ is the name of the external organization

resources.string: Nous ne pouvons peut-être pas afficher tous les détails. Appelez %1$@ ou visitez le portail patient pour plus d\'informations.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_standard_title
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has an organization that requires manual updates. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: %1$@ exige des mises à jour manuelles

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_standard_title_plural
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has organizations that require manual updates. %1$@ is the number of organizations.

resources.string: %1$@ établissements exigent des mises à jour manuelles

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_standard_title_no_org_names
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has organizations that require manual updates.

resources.string: Certains établissements exigent des mises à jour manuelles

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_standard_body
string.context: Happy Together refresh banner explanation text to prompt the user to update.

resources.string: Pour obtenir vos informations à jour, utiliser le bouton Mettre à jour.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_error_title
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has an organization that had an error while updating. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Une erreur est survenue lors de la mise à jour de %1$@

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_error_title_plural
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has organizations that had errors while updating. %1$@ is the number of organizations.

resources.string: Des erreurs sont survenues lors de la mise à jour de %1$@ établissements

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_error_body
string.context: Happy Together refresh banner explanation text to prompt the user to update after an error has occurred.

resources.string: Utiliser le bouton Mettre à jour pour réessayer.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_error_body_other_orgs
string.context: Happy Together refresh banner explanation text when the user has an organization that requires manual update while others have encountered an error while updating. %1$@ is the name of the organization that requires manual update.

resources.string: Un autre établissement, %1$@, exige des mises à jour manuelles. Utiliser le bouton Mettre à jour pour réessayer.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_error_body_other_orgs_plural
string.context: Happy Together refresh banner explanation text when the user has organizations that requires manual update while others have encountered an error while updating. %1$@ is number of organizations that require manual update.

resources.string: %1$@ autres établissements exigent des mises à jour manuelles. Utiliser le bouton Mettre à jour pour réessayer.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_loading_title
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has an organization that is loading. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Chargement en cours de vos informations à partir de %1$@

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_loading_title_plural
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has organizations that are loading. %1$@ is the number of organizations.

resources.string: Chargement en cours de vos informations de %1$@ établissements

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_loading_title_no_org_names
string.context: Appears in the Happy Together refresh banner when the user has organizations that are loading.

resources.string: Chargement de vos informations en cours

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_update_button
string.context: Update button in the Happy Together refresh banner. Allows users to update their date from other organizations.

string.name: wp_community_update_banner_dismiss_button
string.context: Dismiss button in the Happy Together refresh banner. Dismisses the banner.

string.name: wp_community_generic_connection_error
string.context: Text displayed in the H2G error popup which is shown when we fail to retrieve outside data from any of the organizations that the patient is connected to due to generic connection issues. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Nous rencontrons actuellement des problèmes avec l\'obtention de données depuis %1$@.

string.name: wp_community_inactive_account_error
string.context: Text displayed in the H2G error popup which is shown when we fail to retrieve outside data from any of the organizations that the patient is connected to due to missing active MyChart account. %1$@ is the organization name.

resources.string: Vous devrez créer un compte avec %1$@.

string.name: wp_community_dismiss_error
string.context: Accessibility label for the X button used to dismiss the H2G error popup

string.name: wp_community_tap_for_details_message
string.context: Tap for details message for h2g error banner. We separate this from the original text because of accessibility issue.

string.name: wp_community_deeplink_error_message
string.context: Error message that shows up when an epichttp link from a remote H2G organization fails to launch. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name of the current organization, %2$@ is the MyChart brand name of the remote organization.

resources.string: Ce lien ne peut pas être ouvert lorsque vous êtes connecté à %1$@. Veuillez vous connecter à %2$@ pour ouvrir ce lien.

string.name: wp_community_deeplink_error_message_no_org_name
string.context: Error message that shows up when an epichttp link from a remote H2G organization fails to launch. %1$@ is the MyChart brand name of the current organization where the link was attempted to be opened for a remote organization (but where do not have any name information for that remote organization)

resources.string: Impossible d\'ouvrir ce lien lorsque vous êtes connecté(e) à %1$@.

string.name: wp_community_outside_organization_label
string.context: Accessibility text for the tappable CE icon

string.name: wp_community_outside_organization_name_label
string.context: Accessibility text for the tappable CE icon. %1$@ is the org name

string.name: wp_community_information_for_title_single
string.context: Title for the popup that shows which account has data for this organization. This is the single account version. %1$@ is the name of the remote organization.

resources.string: La personne suivante a un compte lié à %1$@:

string.name: wp_community_information_for_title
string.context: Title for the popup that shows which accounts (patients) have data for this organization. This is the plural accounts version. %1$@ is the name of the remote organization.

resources.string: Les personnes suivantes ont des comptes liés à %1$@:

string.name: wp_core_imagecouldnotberetrieved
string.context: Alert text when an image could not be loaded

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_opennewapp
string.context: message appears when a user clicks on a link in a webview activity that would lead to a new app. Param 1 is the link being opened.

resources.string: Voulez-vous ouvrir ce lien dans une autre application? %1$@

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_opennewapp_yes
string.context: alert button that opens a link in an external app

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_opennewapp_no
string.context: alert button closes an alert without opening a link in an external app

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_noapp
string.context: message appears when a user clicks on a link in a webview activity that would lead to a new app and the app failed to load.

resources.string: Échec du lancement de l\'autre application.

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_download
string.context: message appears when a user clicks on a link in a webview activity that would download a file.

resources.string: Voulez-vous télécharger ce fichier sur votre appareil?

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_download_yes
string.context: alert button that downloads a file

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_download_no
string.context: alert button closes an alert without downloading a file

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_download_description
string.context: The description for a file downloaded

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_download_toast
string.context: Toast message after user started downloading a file from MyChart

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_close
string.context: alt-text for the 'close' button in a MyChart Web-based workflow

string.name: wp_core_mychartweb_back
string.context: Text for the 'Back' button in a MyChart Web-based workflow

string.name: wp_mychart_feature_to_browser_title
string.context: A title shown to the user if the feature is not supported in the app

resources.string: Utiliser cette fonctionnalité en dehors de l\'application

string.name: wp_mychart_feature_to_browser_message
string.context: A message shown to tell the patient they can launch this feature outside the app

resources.string: Cette fonctionnalité doit être lancée en dehors de l\'application. Voulez-vous continuer?

string.name: wp_mychart_feature_to_browser_yes
string.context: Option to agree to launch a feature outside the application. But only this time.

string.name: wp_mychart_feature_to_browser_yes_always
string.context: Option to agree to launch a feature outside the application. And to do this every time.

resources.string: Oui, toujours lancer en dehors de l\'application

string.name: wp_mychart_feature_to_browser_no
string.context: Option to not agree to launch outside the application and instead stay in the app

string.name: wp_mychart_custom_feature_external_launch_title
string.context: A title shown to the user when they are launching a feature that is about to take them out of the app

resources.string: Vous êtes lancé en dehors de l\'application.

string.name: wp_mychart_custom_feature_external_launch_yes
string.context: Option to agree to launch a feature outside the application to open the browser.

string.name: wp_mychart_custom_feature_external_launch_no
string.context: Option to not agree to launch outside the application to open the feature and instead stay in the app

string.name: wp_todo_education_question_subject
string.context: Subject text for a message sent to provider when patient has a question about an education task.%1$@ is the title of the education task

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_attachmenttitle
string.context: menu title for a dialog that allows the user to choose a file

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_takenewphoto
string.context: menu option that lets the user take a photo with the device camera

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_choosephoto
string.context: menu option that lets the user choose an existing photo from the device

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_takenewvideo
string.context: menu option that lets the user take a video with the device camera

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_choosevideo
string.context: menu option that lets the user choose an existing video from the device

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_choosefile
string.context: menu option that lets the user choose an existing file from the device

string.name: wp_core_filechooser_attachmenterror
string.context: Toast shown when there was an error uploading a document

resources.string: Impossible de finaliser votre chargement pour le moment. Veuillez réessayer plus tard.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_error_title
string.context: The error title when the user rejects the proper permissions to do something in the app.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_photo_take_error_message
string.context: The error message when the user rejects the proper permissions to take a photo.

resources.string: Pour prendre une photo, veuillez autoriser l\'application à accéder à votre caméra.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_photo_select_error_message
string.context: The error message when the user rejects the proper permissions to access storage when selecting a photo.

resources.string: Pour sélectionner une photo, veuillez autoriser l\'application à accéder à votre espace de stockage.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_video_take_error_message
string.context: The error message when the user rejects the proper permissions to take a video.

resources.string: Pour enregistrer une vidéo, veuillez autoriser l\'application à accéder à votre caméra et votre espace de stockage.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_video_select_error_message
string.context: The error message when the user rejects the proper permissions to access storage when selecting a video.

resources.string: Pour sélectionner une vidéo, veuillez autoriser l\'application à accéder à votre espace de stockage.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_file_select_error_message
string.context: The error message when the user rejects the proper permissions to access storage when selecting a file.

resources.string: Pour sélectionner un document, veuillez autoriser l\'application à accéder à votre espace de stockage.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_set_permissions_button
string.context: The default yes button for requesting permissions.

string.name: wp_core_permissions_nevermind_button
string.context: The default no button for requesting permissions.

string.name: wp_test_string_with_params
string.context: This is a test string for unit testing. Do not worry about translation.

plurals.name: wp_test_string_with_plurals
plurals.context: This is a test string for unit testing. Do not worry about translation.

plurals.name: wp_test_plural_testing
plurals.context: These strings are for plural testing and do not need to be translated

plurals.name: wp_test_plural_testing_fallback
plurals.context: These strings are for plural testing and do not need to be translated

string.context: Accessibility text for the Inline Education Infobutton

string.context: Accessibility text for the Inline Education Infobutton

string.context: Accessibility text for the Inline Education Infobutton

string.name: wp_inline_education_view_allergy
string.context: Accessibility text for the Inline Education Infobutton

string.name: wp_inline_education_view_immunization
string.context: Accessibility text for the Inline Education Infobutton

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_skip
string.context: Button label to dismiss onboarding

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_next
string.context: Button label to move to the next slide in the Onboarding workflow

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_back
string.context: Button label to move to the previous slide in the Onboarding workflow

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_complete
string.context: Button label to complete the Onboarding workflow

string.name: wp_core_onboarding_how_to_video
string.context: This is the text of a button that the user can select to play an education video.

string.name: wp_core_accessibility_onboarding_page_control
string.context: Accessibility label telling the user what page on onboarding they are currently on. %1$@ is the current page index. $2$s is the total number of pages.

string.name: wp_core_tutorial_title
string.context: text for the tutorial pane title

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_close_content_description
string.context: text for the button that a user will tap to exit tutorials, this will be read by TalkBack when the user reaches the button

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_close
string.context: text for the button that a user will tap to exit tutorials

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_more_help
string.context: Text for a button in tutorials that is used to continue receiving tutorial info

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_back
string.context: Text for a button in tutorials that is used to go back a step

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_done_button_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the 'done' button in a tutorial. This will be read by VoiceOver when the user reaches the button

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_done_button_accessibility_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint for the 'done' button in a tutorial. This explains what will happen when the button is tapped and will be read by VoiceOver after the accessibility label

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_next_button_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the 'next' button in a tutorial. This will be read by VoiceOver when the user reaches the button

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_next_button_accessibility_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint for the 'next' button in a tutorial. This explains what will happen when the button is tapped and will be read by VoiceOver after the accessibility label

resources.string: Avance à la page suivante du tutoriel

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_previous_button_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the 'previous' button in a tutorial. This will be read by VoiceOver when the user reaches the button

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_previous_button_accessibility_hint
string.context: Accessibility hint for the 'previous' button in a tutorial. This explains what will happen when the button is tapped and will be read by VoiceOver after the accessibility label

resources.string: Retourne à la page précédente du tutoriel

string.name: wp_core_tutorials_progress_accessibility_label
string.context: Accessibility label for the control that indicates the current page

string.name: wp_core_camera_missing_permissions_title
string.context: Title for an alert that explains to the user that the application lacks sufficient permission to access the device's camera.

string.name: wp_core_camera_missing_permissions_message_ios
string.context: Alert message that hat explains to the user that the application lacks sufficient permission to access the device's camera. %1$@ is the application name (i.e. MyChart).

resources.string: %1$@ n\'est pas autorisé à accéder à votre appareil photo. Pour autoriser %1$@, veuillez autoriser l\'accès à votre appareil photo dans Paramètres> %1$@.

string.name: wp_core_validation_specialcharacters_title
string.context: Title for an alert that explains to the user that special characters cannot be entered as input.

string.name: wp_core_validation_specialcharacters_message
string.context: Alert message that explains to the user that special characters cannot be entered as input.

resources.string: Vous ne pouvez pas saisir de caractères spéciaux ici, y compris des caractères de certaines langues ou des émojis.

string.name: wp_h2g_dismiss_content_description
string.context: Accessibility content description for a dismiss icon button

string.name: wp_pdf_download_title
string.context: Error title on pop up when the user can not view the PDF in the app.

resources.string: Impossible d\'afficher le PDF dans l\'application

string.name: wp_pdf_download_message
string.context: Error message on pop up when the user can not view the PDF in the app. %1$@ is the application name

resources.string: Voulez-vous télécharger le fichier PDF pour l\'afficher avec une application externe? Une fois ce fichier téléchargé, il ne sera plus sécurisé par %1$@. D\'autres applications sur votre appareil peuvent avoir accès à ce fichier.

string.name: wp_pdf_yes_download
string.context: Button to download the file

string.name: wp_pdf_no_permission
string.context: User did not give permissions to download the file

resources.string: Impossible de télécharger le fichier. Autorisation de fichier obligatoire.

string.name: wp_pdf_download_success
string.context: The PDF was downloaded successfully

string.name: wp_pdf_download_error
string.context: The PDF was not downloaded due to an error

resources.string: Erreur lors du téléchargement du PDF

string.name: wp_file_download_saved
string.context: The PDF was saved successfully

string.name: wp_file_download_failed
string.context: Appears when the user's file download has failed

resources.string: Un problème est survenu lors du téléchargement de votre fichier. Veuillez vous rendre sur le site Web pour accéder au fichier.

string.name: wp_how_to_video_header
string.context: Title used on the header of How To video cards

string.name: wp_how_to_video_share_everywhere_title
string.context: Title of the How To video for Share Everywhere, which appears in a card on the Share Everywhere page

string.name: wp_how_to_video_share_everywhere_description
string.context: Description of the How To video for Share Everywhere, which appears in a card on the Share Everywhere page

resources.string: Apprenez à partager votre dossier médical avec un prestataire de soins qui n\'y a pas encore accès.

string.name: wp_how_to_video_video_visit_title
string.context: Title of the How To video for Video Visits, which appears in a card in appointment details for a video visit

string.name: wp_how_to_video_video_visit_description
string.context: Description of the How To video for Video Visits, which appears in a card in appointment details for a video visit

resources.string: Apprenez à effectuer le check-in et commencer votre consultation vidéo.

string.name: wp_how_to_vaccination_credential_access_video_title
string.context: Header text displayed under a vaccination credential education video describing the purpose of the video

resources.string: Accéder à vos informations de vaccination et d\'analyses dans MyChart

string.name: wp_how_to_vaccination_credential_access_video_description
string.context: Label text displayed under a vaccination credential education video describing the purpose of the video in more detail

resources.string: Apprendre à partager vos informations de vaccination et d\'analyse COVID-19 rapidement, facilement et en toute sécurité, directement depuis MyChart.

string.name: wp_how_to_video_thumbnail_accessibility
string.context: Description of the video thumbnail that will be read by screen readers

string.name: wp_how_to_learning_topics_label
string.context: Text for the button to expand or collapse the How To video card

string.name: wp_how_to_watch_more
string.context: Text for the link to watch more videos in the video library

string.name: wp_core_biometrics_label
string.context: Name used for describing the android biometric login method. Used in a sentences like 'A passcode or biometrics has already been enabled at this organization.'

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_location
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Location. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Géolocalisation: %1$@ peut utiliser vos données de localisation pour notifier l\'accueil lorsque vous arrivez pour un rendez-vous, même si l\'application est fermée ou n\'est pas en cours d\'utilisation, ou pour suggérer des prestataires près de vous lorsque l\'application est en cours d\'utilisation. %1$@ ne stockera pas vos données de localisation.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_camera
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Camera. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Caméra: %1$@ peut utiliser votre caméra pour prendre de nouvelles photos ou pour capturer et transmettre des vidéos pour les consultations vidéo. Vous choisissez si vous voulez utiliser des photos pour personnaliser votre compte ou en envoyer en tant que pièces jointes lorsque vous envoyez des messages à vos prestataires.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_microphone
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Microphone. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Micro: %1$@ peut utiliser votre micro pour capturer le son pour les consultations vidéo et la dictée. %1$@ ne stockera pas vos données audio.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_storage
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Storage. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Stockage: %1$@ peut accéder à l\'espace de stockage de votre appareil pour lire et écrire des fichiers, des images, des vidéos et des clips audio que vous choisissez d\'utiliser dans %1$@. Ces fichiers, images, vidéos et clips audio peuvent être utilisés comme pièces jointes à envoyer à votre prestataire ou peuvent être créés à partir de pièces jointes que votre prestataire vous envoie.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_call_phone
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Call Phone. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Téléphone: %1$@ peut utiliser votre téléphone pour appeler les numéros de téléphone affichés dans l\'application. %1$@ ne stockera pas votre historique des appels ou d\'autres données d\'appels.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_bluetooth
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Bluetooth. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Bluetooth: %1$@ peut accéder au Bluetooth de votre appareil pour détecter d\'autres appareils à proximité. Ces informations seront utilisées pour notifier l\'accueil lorsque vous arrivez pour un rendez-vous. %1$@ ne stockera pas vos données Bluetooth.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_notifications
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Notifications. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name.

resources.string: Notification: %1$@ peut publier des notifications sur votre appareil. Ces notifications seront utilisées pour vous informer des mises à jour de l\'application.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_health_connect_background_access
string.context: When showing the user why we are requesting the permission this is the name of the permission we are requesting. In this case Health Connect Background Access. It also contains a description of why we use this permission. %1$@ is the application name. %2$@ is the organization's branded name for MyChart

resources.string: Accès en arrière-plan: %1$@ peut accéder aux données Santé Connect en arrière-plan pour enregistrer les relevés dans votre compte %2$@ tant que cette application n\'est pas ouverte.

plurals.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_title
plurals.context: The title of the prominent disclosure pop up. This is shown to the user to let them know we are able to request permission and why we are requesting them. %1$@ is the app name.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_agree
string.context: The button of the prominent disclosure pop up. This is shown to the user to let them know we are able to request permission and why we are requesting them. When clicking, the app will ask the user for permissions.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_skip
string.context: The button of the prominent disclosure pop up. This is shown to the user to let them know we are able to request permission and why we are requesting them. When clicking, the app will not ask the user for permissions now. But may in the future.

string.name: wp_permissions_prominent_disclosures_share_info
string.context: The info text of the prominent disclosure pop up. This lets the user know we never share this information with third-parties. %1$@ is the app name.

resources.string: %1$@ ne partagera jamais ces informations avec des tiers.

string.name: wp_core_button_content_description
string.context: Accessibility content description to specify the input type is a button for a specific view. The comma is there so that the screen reader pauses before reading it.

string.name: wp_core_link_content_description
string.context: Accessibility content description to specify the input type is a link for a specific view. The comma is there so that the screen reader pauses before reading it.

string.name: wp_core_ax_section_collapsed
string.context: Accessibility only message that indicates that a section is collapsed. This will be read by screen reader when the user reaches the button.

string.name: wp_core_ax_section_expanded
string.context: Accessibility only message that indicates that a section is expanded.This will be read by screen reader when the user reaches the button

string.name: wp_org_selection_scan_qr_code
string.context: Text for a button that opens the camera to scan a QR code.

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_header_do_not_delete
string.context: Reportable Issue's header, instructing users to not delete any information

resources.string: Ne supprimer pas les informations suivantes:

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_time
string.context: Label for the current time used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the current time

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_org_id
string.context: Label for the organization ID used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the organization ID

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_org_name
string.context: Label for the organization name used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the organization name

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_http_code
string.context: Label for the http code used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the http code

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_device_model
string.context: Label for the device model used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the device model

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_os_version
string.context: Label for the os version used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the os version

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_app_version
string.context: Label for the app version used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the app version

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_app_id
string.context: Label for the app id used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the app id

string.name: wp_reportable_issue_data_label_url
string.context: Label for the url used in a Reportable Issue. %1$@ is the url

string.name: wp_language_picker_button_text
string.context: Text for the button that opens an in-app language picker activity

string.name: wp_language_picker_title
string.context: Title for the in-app language picker activity where users can change the app language

string.name: wp_language_picker_description
string.context: Description for the in-app language picker activity where users can change the app language. %1$@ is the current organization name

string.name: wp_language_picker_system_default_row_primary_text
string.context: Primary text for the row allowing the user to select the system default language for their preferred in-app language

string.name: wp_language_picker_system_default_row_secondary_text
string.context: Secondary text for the row allowing the user to select the system default language for their preferred in-app language

resources.string: Préférences de langue de cet appareil

string.name: wp_language_picker_custom_locale_disclaimer_dialog_title
string.context: Disclaimer title shown in a alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that switching to this language may not show complete translations. %1$@ is the MyChart app branded name. %2$@ is the new language being switched to.

string.name: wp_language_picker_custom_locale_disclaimer_dialog_text
string.context: Disclaimer text shown in a alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that switching to this language may not show complete translations. %1$@ is the MyChart app branded name. %2$@ is the new language being switched to.

resources.string: %1$@ ne prend pas entièrement en charge cette langue (%2$@). Vous verrez peut-être du contenu en anglais.

string.name: wp_language_picker_custom_locale_disclaimer_dialog_confirm_button
string.context: Confirmation button for the alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that switching to this language may not show complete translations. %1$@ is the language being switched to in the current language.

string.name: wp_language_picker_unsaved_changes_dialog_title
string.context: Title text for the alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that they have made a selection and have not yet saved.

resources.string: Vous avez des modifications non enregistrées

string.name: wp_language_picker_unsaved_changes_dialog_text
string.context: Description text for the alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that they have made a selection and have not yet saved. %1$@ is the language being switched to in the current language.

resources.string: Voulez-vous changer la langue à: %1$@ avant de quitter?

string.name: wp_language_picker_unsaved_changes_dialog_text_default
string.context: Description text for the alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that they have made a selection for the devices default language preferences and have not yet saved.

resources.string: Voulez-vous revenir à la langue par défaut de votre appareil avant de quitter?

string.name: wp_language_picker_unsaved_changes_dialog_negative_button
string.context: Negative button text for the alert dialog style notification that notifies the user that they have made a selection and have not yet saved.

string.name: wp_language_picker_stored_locale_no_longer_allowed_notification
string.context: Notification shown to the user when they have previously selected a preferred language, but the selection is no longer allowed by the organization.

resources.string: Votre langue préférée n\'est plus prise en charge.

string.name: wp_language_picker_jump_to_settings_alert_description
string.context: Alert description shown to the user when they opt to change their language in iOS. Notifies the user that they are being sent to iOS settings and educates the user on the allowed language options for the current organization. %1$@ is the current organization name

resources.string: Continuer vers Paramètres pour changer la langue de votre application. Bien que d\'autres langues peuvent être proposées, seules les langues suivantes seront affichées dans %1$@.

string.name: wp_web_view_generic_crash_message
string.context: Message shown to users when a web view crashes after the app has closed the crashed web view.

resources.string: Une erreur est survenue dans cette activité, veuillez réessayer

string.name: wp_generic_download_failed_message
string.context: Message shown to users when a download fails

resources.string: Échec du téléchargement, veuillez réessayer plus tard

string.name: wp_file_view_share
string.context: Text displayed on a button that the user taps to share or download content outside of the app

string.name: wp_file_view_share_error
string.context: Message shown to users when they tried to share a file, but an error occurred that prevents the file from being shared

resources.string: Une erreur est survenue lors de la tentative de partage de ce fichier, veuillez réessayer plus tard

string.name: wp_file_view_file_cannot_be_displayed_title
string.context: Message shown to users when a file in the file viewer cannot be displayed. This text is displayed above the string wp_file_view_file_cannot_be_displayed_detailed

string.name: wp_file_view_file_cannot_be_displayed_detailed
string.context: Message shown to users explaining why a file in the file viewer cannot be displayed. %1$@ is the application's display name.

resources.string: %1$@ ne prend pas en charge l\'affichage de ce type de fichier.

string.name: wp_file_view_file_cannot_be_displayed_link
string.context: Message shown as a link for users to tap when they want to open a file that cannot be viewed in the file viewer in another app

resources.string: Consulter ce fichier dans une autre application

string.name: wp_generic_file_share_warning
string.context: Message shown to users when they attempt to share a file outside of the app. %1$@ is the application name

resources.string: Une fois exporté, ce fichier ne sera plus sécurisé par %1$@. D\'autres applications sur votre appareil pourraient avoir accès à ce fichier. Voulez-vous continuer?

string.name: wp_generic_file_share_warning_yes_dont_ask_again
string.context: Button label for the button the user can tap to share a file outside of the app and not be shown a file share warning again

string.name: wp_captured_workflow_progress_dots
string.context: Indicates the progress of the captured workflow, where %1$@ is the current task and %2$@ is the total number of tasks.

string.name: wp_captured_workflow_cancel
string.context: The title of a button that will cancel the current state.

string.name: wp_secure_text_field_hide_text_entry
string.context: Accessibility label for a button that hides the text in a secure text field.

string.name: wp_secure_text_field_show_text_entry
string.context: Accessibility label for a button that shows the text in a secure text field.
